hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export PATH=$PATH:/opt/infer-dev/infer.git/infer/bin/
umask 0022 rm -rf $(find . -name "*.OBJ") if test ! -d nspr; then hg clone https://hg.mozilla.org/projects/nspr else cd nspr && hg pull -u && cd - fi if test ! -d nss; then hg clone https://hg.mozilla.org/projects/nss else cd nss && hg pull -u && cd - fi
cd nss make nss_clean_all USE_64=1 infer -o nss-infer/ -x nss -- make nss_build_all
chmod o+rx $(find nss-infer/ -type d) chmod -R o+r nss-infer rsync -arv -R nss-infer/ sledru@people.mozilla.org:/home/sledru/public_html/reports/
